page.title: Thanks for playing Autumn!
page.text: An Incredibox Mod by (!color/#ffd754/Charlles) with the help of:(!line) (!color/#bc8fff/ColdSeamer): some melodies animation and bonus assist.(!line) (!color/#5eabf7/Ters): animation and json assist.(!line) (!color/#02f7eb/Bonbonnet):design concepts.(!line) (!color/#02caf7/Rem): helping with code and build.(!line) (!color/#3275c7/GrungeMan): design concepts.

page.title: Thanks to the legacy team!
page.text: Artemiy Kopych, Looped, Brian, Horus and LTFD

page.title: INCREDIBOX BY SO FAR SO GOOD!
page.text: And of course the official developers of Incredibox, (!bold/Allan), (!bold/Romain) and Incredible (!bold/Polo)! Without them, this project wouldn't exist! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line)Buy Official Incredibox for more fun and to support the team!(!line)(!line)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com//Incredibox Website)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com/info/store/Buy Incredibox)
